metrics_conclusion: The Past And Pending has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: The Past And Pending has sections analyzed in the following keys: E Mixolydian,  and A Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
